}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P05-6833100" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos. :The wireless module is a [[MSI MP54G2 (MS-6833)]]. The block diagram states the device uses.. *an ''Intel'' XScale IXP-425 @ 266MHz CPU *16 MB of ''Intel'' Flash *32 MB of RAM *two [http://www.silabs.com/products/voice/slic/Pages/Si32xxProSLIC.aspx '''Silicon Labs''' Si3210] for VoIP use
The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is a '''Netgear'''-branded DSA-0151F-12 A (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.4A -> 12VDC, 1.5A).
==Links of Interest== [http://kbserver.netgear.com/products/WGR826V.asp Support page] (useless)
